scopes.name: $XSAPPNAME.admin
scopes.description: Full access to all data and ressources as well as create, edit and delete of metadata and normal data

scopes.name: $XSAPPNAME.worker
scopes.description: Only create and view all trips. Edit his own trips if not accepted by others. Add comment and see status of trip

scopes.name: $XSAPPNAME.backoffice-worker
scopes.description: Full access on trip data. Can edit, remove, and see trips, can add flight and hotel booking codes. Kann add comments to all trips. Can change the status of a trip
